duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and lead the internal audit department, including planning, managing, and performing specialized investigative audits.
Assist in the development of the annual audit plan, execution, monitoring, and risk assessment.
Examine records of institutional fiscal expenditures for compliance with external controls, reporting methods, and limitations.
Analyze and evaluate audit results, developing recommendations to correct deficiencies.

education_certification.credential: BS in Accounting or Finance required, CPA certification preferred, 5-8 years of internal audit experience
